overview: Twelfth and last studio album by singer Jenni Rivera released on November 22, 2011 by Fonovisa Records and Universal Music in Mexico. Joyas Prestadas consists of eleven songs recorded in pop and band versions respectively. Jenni commented that the songs she chose for this album were the ones she liked best when she was working as a cashier at a record store.
title: Jenni Rivera: Joyas Prestadas
